About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Currently working as a Senior System Engineer with Infosys Technologies Ltd, Hyderabad with total experience of 3 years. B.Tech in Information Technology from K.J.Somaiya College of Engineering, Vidyavihar Mumbai. My Objective is to work in tandem with a team in a challenging and competitive environment where I

Online Portal

Mean Stack Developer

Node.Js and Express framework was used for backend server setup and accessing different routes and node modules. MongoDb was used for storage purpose and Mongoose ODM module was used to create user schema and other functionalities required for the application. REST APIâ€™s was created to access the required data from backend and perform other update activities Front end of the application was developed using Angular2 framework including the router and HTTP modules to achieve various functionalities. Passport modules JWT strategy was used for Token generation and authentication along with angular 2 JWT to provide tokens to authorize users only. Auth Guard service was used to prevent authorization to different routes of the applications. Error handling and validation was achieved using the Angular Flash Message module to display different success and failure messages.

NodeJs Application

Node API Developer

Frontend development was based on Bootstrap, HTML5 and CSS3. Template engine was used for these pages (EJS and PUG). Backend was based on Mongodb and Mongoose module was used for Object relational mapping. Overall development was based on Node.JS Express framework, routing module to route to different pages along with Javascript and Jquery Body-parser module was used to get the frontend information and Express Validator for validation purpose. Login, logout and user registration was developed using Passport module of Node.Js.

Enterprise application

Software Developer

Developing Backend database for storing user information using SQL (Oracle10g) and Hibernate Query language. Used JSP for frontend development along with HTML and JSF. Used JAVA and Hibernate framework to implement DAO and servlet for creating Business logic to access and store the data. ORM was used to Map objects to database table. Resolved various functional and logical issues of project during training.
